Taking the Initiative

Hello, I’m Steven Chan, a UX designer and front-end web developer focused on making creative responsive websites. Currently, I am pursuing a BSc at Simon Fraser University’s School of Interactive Arts & Technology.

My web development toolkit includes HTML, CSS, and GitHub with JavaScript currently in progress. On the design side, I apply a solid understanding of graphic layout, wireframing, content hierarchy, and accessibility. I am also proficient with the Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, and After Effects).

If you are looking for creativity in your web developer role, I would like to get in touch.
